name: sst-macro

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: otf2
variants.description: Enable OTF2 trace emission and replay support

variants.name: werror
variants.description: Build with all warnings as errors

description:
The Structural Simulation Toolkit Macroscale Element Library simulates
large-scale parallel computer architectures for the coarse-grained study
of distributed-memory applications. The simulator is driven from either
a trace file or skeleton application. SST/macro's modular architecture
can be extended with additional network models, trace file formats,
software services, and processor models.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: binutils
dependencies.description: GNU binutils, which contain the linker, assembler, objdump and others

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: llvm
dependencies.description:
The LLVM Project is a collection of modular and reusable compiler and
toolchain technologies. Despite its name, LLVM has little to do with
traditional virtual machines, though it does provide helpful libraries
that can be used to build them. The name "LLVM" itself is not an
acronym; it is the full name of the project.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Mvapich2 is a High-Performance MPI Library for clusters with diverse
networks (InfiniBand, Omni-Path, Ethernet/iWARP, and RoCE) and computing
platforms (x86 (Intel and AMD), ARM and OpenPOWER)

dependencies.name: otf2
dependencies.description:
The Open Trace Format 2 is a highly scalable, memory efficient event
trace data format plus support library.

dependencies.name: sst-core
dependencies.description:
The Structural Simulation Toolkit (SST) core provides a parallel
discrete event simulation (PDES) framework for performing architecture
simulations of existing and proposed HPC systems

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependent_to.name: sst-transports
dependent_to.description: Provides transports like uGNI and verbs that run in the simulator
